preibisch_imagelib2.algorithm.localextrema

Interface LocalExtrema.LocalNeighborhoodCheck<P,T extends Comparable<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - A representation of the extremum. For example, this could be just a Point describing the location of the extremum. It could contain additional information such as the value at the extremum or an extremum type.
    T - pixel type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalExtrema.MaximumCheck, LocalExtrema.MinimumCheck
    Enclosing class:
    LocalExtrema

    public static interface LocalExtrema.LocalNeighborhoodCheck<P,T extends Comparable<T>>
    A local extremum check.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <C extends Localizable & Sampler<T>>
      P      		 check(C center, Neighborhood<T> neighborhood)
      Determine whether a pixel is a local extremum.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        <C extends Localizable & Sampler<T>> P check(C center,
                                             Neighborhood<T> neighborhood)
        Determine whether a pixel is a local extremum. If so, return a P that represents the maximum. Otherwise return null.
        Parameters:
        center - an access located on the pixel to test
        neighborhood - iterable neighborhood of the pixel, not containing the pixel itself.
        Returns:
        null if the center not a local extremum, a P if it is.
